message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500 for the product.

I understand you're getting closer to the price you're willing to pay, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $11,250. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'll offer the product to you for $11,200. This is my final adjustment, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,100 for the product.
I'm getting close to the end of my negotiation flexibility, Bob. I'll offer the product to you for $11,150. This is my last chance to make a deal.
Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,100 for the product.
